name: Witches of the North VN - Prologue PROTO
name_original: Witches of the North VN - Prologue PROTO
description:
Witches of the North is my original story project, which I release in chapters (like a book, not a VN). You may find more info here > https://wotnorth.carrd.co/

I decided to just play around with Ren'Py to make a small Prologue for it, for anyone who's curious to see. I will likely NOT make this story into a VN, this is just a little demo/trial for me.

Should work on Windows and Mac.
